rows.label: qev087602_MSG0001
rows.name: Looks like we found the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0002
rows.name:
Kitty-cat friends look jumpy.
Maybe shoot Tatsu when he approach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0003
rows.name: ...So Tatsu strike first![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0004
rows.name:
This is a diplomatic mission—
we'll just explain to them that we come in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0005
rows.name: You there! Halt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0006
rows.name: Are you aware that this keep belongs to Prince Ga Jiarg?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0007
rows.name: Yes, we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0008
rows.name:
We've come to speak with the prince.
May we be granted an audience?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0009
rows.name: The human knows her place... And yet, they cannot be trusted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0010
rows.name: We've met before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0011
rows.name: I'm Ga Buidhe, adjunct to the prince.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0012
rows.name: We have a letter for His Highness. May we bring it to him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0013
rows.name:
Do you know the circumstances
we Wrothians now face, human?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0014
rows.name:
We heard you parted ways with the Ganglion.
That's why we're here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0015
rows.name:
That was His Highness's will,
and it is not my place to question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0016
rows.name: But I know you filled his head with strange ideas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0017
rows.name: I would not have it happen again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0010
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Ga Buidhe that it's very
important you see the prince.

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0020
rows.name: Gripe

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist that Ga Buidhe let you see the prince at once.

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0018
rows.name:
That's right. We come with a proposal
that can benefit both of our people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0019
rows.name: I care not for your opinion on this matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0020
rows.name: Yes! This is crucial negotiation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0021
rows.name: A Nopon? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0022
rows.name:
We Wrothians know of your people—
of your avarice and greed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0030
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that Ga Jiarg should decide for himself.

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0040
rows.name: Beg

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0041
rows.name: Plead with Ga Buidhe to let you through.

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0023
rows.name: Will you at least ASK if he'll see us? Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0024
rows.name: No.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0024_2
rows.name: I'll not see His Highness led astray by your poison tongues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0025
rows.name: We're not leaving here until you let us share our proposal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0026
rows.name: Words are but wind, and yours rattle loudly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0027
rows.name: In this harsh land, only strength holds meaning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0028
rows.name:
If you would force your will this day,
you must win that right in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0029
rows.name: Such is the Wrothian way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0051
rows.name: Take on Ga Buidhe's challenge.

rows.label: qev087602_JNK0060
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: qev087602_SEL0061
rows.name: Say you did not come to fight.

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0030
rows.name: Wait, stop![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0031
rows.name: No. This is our only choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0032
rows.name: I'm afraid we don't have a choice here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0033
rows.name: Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0034
rows.name:
We’re guests of the Wrothians.
If this is their way, we have no choice but to obey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087602_MSG0035
rows.name: Spoken like a true warrior![ST:wait ]
